data.title: The Royal Watcher
data.text:
Today marks the Anniversary of the Birth of Princess Margaret, the Queen’s late sister, who was born on this day in 1930! As one of the leading members of the Royal Family for decades, the late Princess had a huge collection of jewellery, which included her Ruby Girandole Earrings!

Continue reading →

Today marks the 205th Anniversary of the Birth of Grand Duchess Maria Nikolaevna of Russia, Duchess of Leuchtenberg, who was born on this day in 1819! The Tsar’s daughter who married the grandson of Empress Joséphine, today we are featuring the Leuchtenberg Fabergé Tiara!

Continue reading →

Royal and Noble Guests and Relatives gathered from around Europe to celebrate the Wedding of Duchess Katharina of Oldenburg and Count Clemens Moy de Sons in Rastede in Oldenburg on July 13th.

Continue reading →

Royal and Noble Guests and Relatives from around Europe gathered to celebrate the Wedding of Archduke Pál von Habsburg-Lothringen and Antonia Lütz at the Bonner Münster in Bonn on July 27th. Continue reading →

Happy Birthday to Queen Raja Zarith Sofiah of Malaysia, who turns 65 today! The accomplished Perak Princess who is the consort of the Sultan of Johor and the current Raja Permaisuri Agong (Queen) of Malaysia, Queen Zarith Sofiah has gained access to the Gandik Diraja Tiara but has a spectacular collection of jewels, so we are featuring the Johor Royal Tiaras today! Continue reading →

Happy Birthday to Baroness Helle Reedtz-Thott, who turns 50 today! The Danish Lawyer and Chatelaine of Gavnø Castle who is a close friend of Queen Mary of Denmark and a godmother of Prince Vincent, Baroness Helle Reedtz-Thott acquired this striking Pearl and Diamond Tiara at Sotheby’s in 2018!

Continue reading →

Happy Birthday to Lady Nicholas Windsor, who celebrates her 55th Birthday today! The accomplished Croatian Aristocrat who became the daughter-in-law of the Duke and Duke of Kent and the first member of the British Royal Family to marry at the Vatican, Lady Nicholas has worn this striking Sapphire Necklace Tiara!

Continue reading →

Happy Birthday to Princess Irene of The Netherlands, who turns 85 today! The second daughter of Queen Juliana who caused much scandal when she converted to Catholicism and gave up her place in the line of succession to marry the Duke of Parma, so to mark her Birthday, we are featuring the magnificent Bourbon-Parma Tiara!

Continue reading →

Today marks the Anniversary of the Birth of Queen Emma of the Netherlands, who was born on this day in 1858! Historic Diamonds of the House of Orange were used to create the striking Van Kempen Tiara and Parure for the young Queen Emma, which she used to create the magnificent Stuart Tiara and Parure two decades later!

Continue reading →

Today marks the 70th Anniversary of the Death of Crown Princess Antonia of Bavaria, who passed away on this day in 1954! The Luxembourg Princess who married the last Bavarian Crown Prince and was imprisoned in a Concentration Camp during the Second World War, Crown Princess Antonia possessed some splendid royal heirlooms, including the magnificent Bavarian Ruby Tiara!

Continue reading →
